unnormalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What's Hot in the Indian Auto Scene?
normalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What is Hot in the Indian Auto Scene?

unnormalised: Namaste folks! Your friendly neighbourhood petrolhead is back with the lowdown on the latest vehicle launches happening right here in Bharat. The auto industry is buzzing like a Delhi market on Diwali!
normalised: Namaste folks! Your friendly neighborhood petrol head is back with the low down on the latest vehicle launches happening right here in Bharat. The auto industry is buzzing like a Delhi market on Diwali!

unnormalised: First up, all eyes are on Mahindra. Rumour has it the new Scorpio N Adventure edition is hitting showrooms soon. We're talking rugged looks, maybe even a snorkel! Perfect for those weekend trips to Ladakh, right? Expect a slight price bump, but hey, looking good on the road is priceless!
normalised: First up, all eyes are on Mahindra. Rumor has it the new Scorpio N Adventure edition is hitting showrooms soon. We are talking rugged looks, maybe even a snorkel! Perfect for those weekend trips to Ladakh, right? Expect a slight price bump, but hey, looking good on the road is priceless!

unnormalised: Then there's Tata Motors, teasing us with something electric. They've been tight-lipped, but whispers suggest it's a Nexon EV facelift with a bigger battery. More range means less range anxiety on those long drives to Pune, folks!
normalised: Then there is Tata Motors, teasing us with something electric. They have been tight lipped, but whispers suggest it is a Nexon E V facelift with a bigger battery. More range means less range anxiety on those long drives to Pune, folks!

unnormalised: And let's not forget Maruti Suzuki. They launched the new Swift recently, and from what I hear from my chacha's friend, a mechanic in Meerut, it's a fuel-efficient beast. Expect mileage figures in the region of 25 kmpl, perfect for dodging those crazy traffic jams in Bangalore.
normalised: And let us not forget Maruti Suzuki. They launched the new Swift recently, and from what I hear from my chacha's friend, a mechanic in Meerut, it is a a fuel efficient beast. Expect mileage figures in the region of twenty five kilometer per liter, perfect for dodging those crazy traffic jams in Bangalore.

unnormalised: Speaking of mileage, Dr. Sharma from IIT-Delhi says that manufacturers are focusing on fuel efficiency and safety features more than ever. We're seeing more airbags, better braking systems, and even advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS) trickling down to more affordable models.
normalised: Speaking of mileage, Doctor Sharma from I I T-Delhi says that manufacturers are focusing on fuel efficiency and safety features more than ever. We are seeing more airbags, better braking systems, and even advanced driver-assistance systems (A D A S) trickling down to more affordable models.

unnormalised: On the luxury front, BMW just unveiled their swanky new i7 M70 xDrive, loaded with tech and costing a cool Rs. 2.5 crore. The showroom in Mumbai is reportedly a whopping 20,000 sq ft! Talk about making a statement.
normalised: On the luxury front, B M W just unveiled their swanky new i7 M70 xDrive, loaded with tech and costing a cool rupee two point five crore. The showroom in Mumbai is reportedly a whopping twenty thousand square feet! Talk about making a statement.

unnormalised: So, there you have it – a quick snapshot of the exciting launches shaking up the Indian automotive scene. Keep your eyes peeled, your wallets ready, and your driving licenses updated! Until next time, drive safe and Jai Hind!
normalised: So, there you have it – a quick snapshot of the exciting launches shaking up the Indian automotive scene. Keep your eyes peeled, your wallets ready, and your driving licenses updated! Until next time, drive safe and Jai Hind!
